pageSetting.title: 支行实体行员人均认领余额

col.title: 全行同类别人均认领余额

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select f.jgdh , f.jgmc,f.lbmc, case when f.rjye=0 then 0 else round(cast(f.rjye as decimal(17,2))/cast(h.jgsthyrs as decimal(17,2)),2) end as lbrjrlye, case when f.qyrjye=0 then 0 else round(cast(f.qyrjye as decimal(17,2))/cast(h.qyjgsthyrs as decimal(17,2)),2) end as qhtlbrjrlye, case when f.rjye=0 then 0 else round (cast((f.rjye /h.jgsthyrs )as decimal(17,2))/cast((f.qyrjye /h.qyjgsthyrs)as decimal(17,2)),2) end as pld from ( select b.khdxdh,b.jgdh,b.jgmc,b.lbdh,b.LBMC,b.rjye,sum(rjye) over (partition by b.lbdh) as qyrjye from ( select a.khdxdh,a.jgdh,a.jgmc,a.LBDH,a.lbmc,sum(a.zhye) rjye from ( select jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hylb.LBDH,hylb.lbmc,sum(ckzh.ZHYE) as zhye from $ckzh$ ckzh inner join KHDX_HYLB hylb on hylb.KHDXDH = ckzh.KHDXDH and $jsrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join KHDX_HY hy on hy.KHDXDH = ckzh.KHDXDH inner join khdx_jg jg on ckzh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where ckzh.GXHSLX='0' and hy.HYDH not like '%XN%'and ckzh.khrq between $ksrq$ and $jsrq$ and ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' group by hylb.LBDH ,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hylb.lbmc union all select jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hylb.LBDH,hylb.lbmc ,sum(ckzh.zhye*dxgx.zlbl*0.01) as zhye from $ckzh$ ckzh inner join $dxgx$ dxgx on ckzh.jxdxdh = dxgx.jxdxdh and dxgx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh = dxgx.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = hylb.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on ckzh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where hy.hydh not like '%XN%' and ckzh.khrq between $ksrq$ and $jsrq$ and ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' group by hylb.LBDH ,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hylb.lbmc )a group by a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc,a.lbmc,a.LBDH )b)f inner join (select d.khdxdh,d.lbdh,d.lbmc,d.jgsthyrs,sum(d.jgsthyrs) over (partition by d.lbdh,d.lbmc) as qyjgsthyrs from ( select jgcy.jgkhdxdh as khdxdh,hylb.lbdh,hylb.lbmc,count(1) as jgsthyrs from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join KHDX_HY hy on hy.KHDXDH = jgcy.KHDXDH and jgcy.JSRQ=29991231 inner join KHDX_HYLB hylb on hylb.KHDXDH = hy.KHDXDH and $jsrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq where hy.HYDH not like '%XN%' group by jgcy.jgkhdxdh,hylb.lbdh,hylb.lbmc)d)h on f.khdxdh=h.khdxdh and h.lbdh=f.lbdh and f.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select f.jgdh , f.jgmc,f.lbmc, case when f.rjye=0 then 0 else round(cast(f.rjye as decimal(17,2))/cast(h.jgsthyrs as decimal(17,2)),2) end as lbrjrlye, case when f.qyrjye=0 then 0 else round(cast(f.qyrjye as decimal(17,2))/cast(h.qyjgsthyrs as decimal(17,2)),2) end as qhtlbrjrlye, case when f.rjye=0 then 0 else round (cast((f.rjye /h.jgsthyrs )as decimal(17,2))/cast((f.qyrjye /h.qyjgsthyrs)as decimal(17,2)),2) end as pld from ( select b.khdxdh,b.jgdh,b.jgmc,b.lbdh,b.LBMC,b.rjye,sum(rjye) over (partition by b.lbdh) as qyrjye from ( select a.khdxdh,a.jgdh,a.jgmc,a.LBDH,a.lbmc,sum(a.zhye) rjye from ( select jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hylb.LBDH,hylb.lbmc,sum(ckzh.ZHYE) as zhye from $ckzh$ ckzh inner join KHDX_HYLB hylb on hylb.KHDXDH = ckzh.KHDXDH and $jsrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join KHDX_HY hy on hy.KHDXDH = ckzh.KHDXDH inner join khdx_jg jg on ckzh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where ckzh.GXHSLX='0' and hy.HYDH not like '%XN%'and ckzh.khrq between $ksrq$ and $jsrq$ and ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' group by hylb.LBDH ,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hylb.lbmc union all select jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hylb.LBDH,hylb.lbmc ,sum(ckzh.zhye*dxgx.zlbl*0.01) as zhye from $ckzh$ ckzh inner join $dxgx$ dxgx on ckzh.jxdxdh = dxgx.jxdxdh and dxgx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh = dxgx.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = hylb.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on ckzh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where hy.hydh not like '%XN%' and ckzh.khrq between $ksrq$ and $jsrq$ and ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' group by hylb.LBDH ,jg.khdxdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hylb.lbmc )a group by a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc,a.lbmc,a.LBDH )b)f inner join (select d.khdxdh,d.lbdh,d.lbmc,d.jgsthyrs,sum(d.jgsthyrs) over (partition by d.lbdh,d.lbmc) as qyjgsthyrs from ( select jgcy.jgkhdxdh as khdxdh,hylb.lbdh,hylb.lbmc,count(1) as jgsthyrs from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join KHDX_HY hy on hy.KHDXDH = jgcy.KHDXDH and jgcy.JSRQ=29991231 inner join KHDX_HYLB hylb on hylb.KHDXDH = hy.KHDXDH and $jsrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq where hy.HYDH not like '%XN%' group by jgcy.jgkhdxdh,hylb.lbdh,hylb.lbmc)d)h on f.khdxdh=h.khdxdh and h.lbdh=f.lbdh and f.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) ) t
